mapper.sql: select u.user_id, u.dept_id, u.login_name, u.user_name,u.area, u.email, u.phonenumber, u.sex, u.avatar, u.password, u.salt, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_time, u.remark,u.record,u.intime,u.firstphase,u.secondphase, d.parent_id, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.status as dept_status, r.role_id,p.post_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.status as role_status from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_post p on p.user_id = u.user_id
mapper.select: select user_id,user_name from sys_user where dept_id in (select dept_id from sys_dept where dept_id = #{deptId} or ancestors like concat('%',#{deptId}, '%'))
